Package com.readytalk.swt.widgets.notifications

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bubble
    Instances of this class represent contextual information about a UI element.

    Bubble will attempt to always be visible on screen.
    If the default Bubble would appear off-screen, we will calculate a suitable location to appear.

    Bubble utilizes the system font, and provides a constructor to indicate use of a bolded font.

    Bubble will also break up lines that would be longer than 400 pixels when drawn.
    You can short-circuit this logic by providing your own line-breaks with \n characters in the text.
    We will never format your text if your provide your own formatting.
    BubbleRegistry
    A singleton that keeps track of all Bubble'd items and their (optional) associated tags.
    Users can use this class to Show and Hide Bubbles by tag or just show all the Bubbles.
    PopOverComposite
    A PopOverShell used to display an arbitrary Composite over a Control or CustomElementDataProvider.
    PopOverShell
    PopOverShell provides a simple interface for popping a Shell on top of any Object that subclasses Control or implements CustomElementDataProvider
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BubbleTag
    An enumeration to add metadata tags to Bubbles for use with the BubbleRegistry.

    For instance, you can tag all Bubbles that describe new features you want to expose your users to by applying the BubbleTag.NEW tag to the Bubble and invoking BubbleRegistry.getInstance().showBubbleByTag(BubbleTag.NEW).
    For more information, see the JavaDoc for BubbleRegistry or the BubbleExample.
